verses.verse: Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ( The Woman Caught in Adultery) δὲ <WG1161> de But ἐπορεύθη <WG4198> eporeuthē went εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄρος <WG3735> oros Mount τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἐλαιῶν <WG1636> elaiōn of Olives .

Ὄρθρου <WG3722> Orthrou Early in the morning δὲ <WG1161> de - πάλιν <WG3825> palin vvv παρεγένετο <WG3854> paregeneto He went [back] εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the ἱερόν <WG2411> hieron temple [courts] . ( Literally the temple; also in verse 20) καὶ <WG2532> kai - πᾶς <WG3956> pas All ὁ <WG3588> ho the λαὸς <WG2992> laos people ἤρχετο <WG2064> ērcheto came πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , καὶ <WG2532> kai and καθίσας <WG2523> kathisas He sat down ἐδίδασκεν <WG1321> edidasken to teach αὐτούς <WG846> autous them .

ἄγουσιν* <WG71> agousin brought δὲ <WG1161> de however , οἱ <WG3588> hoi The γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - Φαρισαῖοι <WG5330> Pharisaioi Pharisees , 〈πρὸς <WG4314> pros to αὐτὸν〉 <WG846> auton Him γυναῖκα <WG1135> gynaika a woman ἐπὶ* <WG1909> epi in μοιχείᾳ <WG3430> moicheia adultery . κατειλημμένην <WG2638> kateilēmmenēn caught καὶ <WG2532> kai - στήσαντες <WG2476> stēsantes They made her stand αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn . . . ἐν <WG1722> en before them μέσῳ <WG3319> mesō . . .

λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin [and] said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Διδάσκαλε <WG1320> Didaskale “ Teacher , αὕτη <WG3778> hautē this ἡ <WG3588> hē - γυνὴ <WG1135> gynē woman κατείληπται* <WG2638> kateilēptai was caught ἐπ’* <WG1909> ep’ in αυτοφώρῳ* <WG1888> autophōrō the act μοιχευομένη <WG3431> moicheuomenē of adultery .

ἐν <WG1722> en In δὲ <WG1161> de - τῷ <WG3588> tō the νόμῳ <WG3551> nomō Law Μωϋσῆς* <WG3475> Mōusēs Moses ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us ἐνετείλατο <WG1781> eneteilato commanded τὰς <WG3588> tas - τοιαύτας <WG5108> toiautas such [a woman] . λιθάζειν* <WG3034> lithazein to stone σὺ <WG4771> sy vvv οὖν <WG3767> oun So τί <WG5101> ti what λέγεις <WG3004> legeis do You say ? ”

Τοῦτο <WG3778> Touto this δὲ <WG1161> de - ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon They said πειράζοντες <WG3985> peirazontes to test αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , ἵνα <WG2443> hina in order ἔχωσιν* <WG2192> echōsin to have [a basis] κατηγορεῖν <WG2723> katēgorein for accusing αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him . ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de But Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus κάτω <WG2736> katō down κύψας <WG2955> kypsas bent τῷ <WG3588> tō with δακτύλῳ <WG1147> daktylō [His] finger . κατέγραφεν* <WG1125> kategraphen [and] began to write εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὴν <WG3588> tēn the γῆν <WG1093> gēn ground

Ὡς <WG5613> Hōs When δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐπέμενον <WG1961> epemenon they continued ἐρωτῶντες <WG2065> erōtōntes to question αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , [ἀνέκυψεν <WG352> anekypsen He straightened up καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said αὐτοῖς] <WG846> autois to them , Ὁ <WG3588> Ho “ [Let] him who is ἀναμάρτητος <WG361> anamartētos without sin ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn among you πρῶτος <WG4413> prōtos first 〈τὸν〉 <WG3588> ton [be] the λίθον <WG3037> lithon a stone «ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ at αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her . ” βαλέτω» <WG906> baletō to cast
καὶ <WG2532> kai And πάλιν <WG3825> palin again κάτω¦κύψας <WG2955> katō¦kypsas He bent down ἔγραφεν <WG1125> egraphen [and] wrote εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὴν <WG3588> tēn the γῆν <WG1093> gēn ground .

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀκούσαντες <WG191> akousantes When they heard this , ( NE, BYZ, and TR include and were convicted by their conscience,) ἐξήρχοντο <WG1831> exērchonto they began to go away εἷς <WG1520> heis one καθ‿ <WG2596> kath by εἷς <WG1520> heis one , ἀρξάμενοι <WG756> arxamenoi beginning ἀπὸ <WG575> apo with τῶν <WG3588> tōn the πρεσβυτέρων <WG4245> presbyterōn older ones , 〈ἕως <WG2193> heōs until τῶν <WG3588> tōn . . . ἐσχάτων〉 <WG2078> eschatōn . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai - κατελείφθη <WG2641> kateleiphthē was left , μόνος <WG3441> monos only 〈ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς〉 <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai with ἡ <WG3588> hē the γυνὴ <WG1135> gynē woman ἐν <WG1722> en - μέσῳ <WG3319> mesō [there] . οὖσα* <WG1510> ousa standing

ἀνακύψας <WG352> anakypsas straightened up ( NE, BYZ, and TR include and saw no one but the woman.) δὲ <WG1161> de Then ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [and] asked αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her , 〈Ἡ〉 <WG3588> HĒ - Γύναι* <WG1135> Gynai “ Woman , ποῦ <WG4226> pou where εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are 〈ἐκεῖνοι <WG1565> ekeinoi vvv οἱ <WG3739> hoi vvv κατήγοροί <WG2725> katēgoroi accusers ? ( WH and NA where are they) σου〉 <WG4771> sou your οὐδείς <WG3762> oudeis Has no one σε <WG4771> se you ? ” κατέκρινεν <WG2632> katekrinen condemned

Ἡ <WG3588> Hē - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen she answered . Οὐδείς <WG3762> Oudeis “ No one , κύριε <WG2962> kyrie Lord , ” Εἶπεν* <WG2036> Eipen declared . δὲ <WG1161> de - 〈αὐτῇ〉 <WG846> autē - ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Οὐδὲ <WG3761> Oude “ Then neither ἐγώ <WG1473> egō do I σε <WG4771> se you , ” κατακρίνω <WG2632> katakrinō condemn πορεύου <WG4198> poreuou go καὶ <WG2532> kai and [ἀπὸ <WG575> apo “ Now τοῦ <WG3588> tou . . . νῦν] <WG3568> nyn . . . μηκέτι <WG3371> mēketi no more . ” ἁμάρτανε <WG264> hamartane sin

( Jesus the Light of the World) ( ( 690 1:5-10 )) Πάλιν <WG3825> Palin Once again οὖν <WG3767> oun . . . , αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to [the people] ἐλάλησεν <WG2980> elalēsen spoke ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus λέγων <WG3004> legōn [and] said , Ἐγώ <WG1473> Egō “ I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs light τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world . ὁ <WG3588> ho Whoever ἀκολουθῶν <WG190> akolouthōn follows ἐμοὶ* <WG1473> emoi Me οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv περιπατήσῃ <WG4043> peripatēsē will never walk ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the σκοτίᾳ <WG4653> skotia darkness , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἕξει <WG2192> hexei will have τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs light τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs of life . ”

Εἶπον <WG2036> Eipon said οὖν <WG3767> oun So αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to Him , οἱ <WG3588> hoi the Φαρισαῖοι <WG5330> Pharisaioi Pharisees Σὺ <WG4771> Sy “ You περὶ <WG4012> peri about σεαυτοῦ <WG4572> seautou Yourself ; μαρτυρεῖς <WG3140> martyreis are testifying ἡ <WG3588> hē - μαρτυρία <WG3141> martyria testimony σου <WG4771> sou Your οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is ἀληθής <WG227> alēthēs valid . ”

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē replied Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Κἂν <WG2579> Kan “ Even if ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I μαρτυρῶ <WG3140> martyrō testify περὶ <WG4012> peri about ἐμαυτοῦ <WG1683> emautou Myself , ἀληθής <WG227> alēthēs valid , ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ἡ <WG3588> hē - μαρτυρία <WG3141> martyria testimony μου <WG1473> mou My ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οἶδα <WG1492> oida I know πόθεν <WG4159> pothen where ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon I came from καὶ <WG2532> kai and ποῦ <WG4226> pou where ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō I am going . ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you δὲ <WG1161> de But οὐκ <WG3756> ouk do not οἴδατε <WG1492> oidate know πόθεν <WG4159> pothen where ἔρχομαι <WG2064> erchomai I came from ἢ <WG2228> ē or ποῦ <WG4226> pou where ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō I am going .

Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis You κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to τὴν <WG3588> tēn the σάρκα <WG4561> sarka flesh ; κρίνετε <WG2919> krinete judge ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv κρίνω <WG2919> krinō judge οὐδένα <WG3762> oudena no one .

καὶ <WG2532> kai even ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if κρίνω <WG2919> krinō do judge , δὲ <WG1161> de But ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I ἡ <WG3588> hē - κρίσις <WG2920> krisis judgment ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἐμὴ <WG1699> emē My ἀληθινή <WG228> alēthinē true , ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because μόνος <WG3441> monos alone ; οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not εἰμί <WG1510> eimi I am ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ - ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I καὶ <WG2532> kai [am with] ὁ <WG3588> ho the πέμψας <WG3992> pempsas [who] sent με <WG1473> me Me . ( Literally but (it is) I and the Father who sent Me; NE but (it is) I and the One who sent Me) ‹πατήρ› <WG3962> patēr Father

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Even ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō [own] νόμῳ <WG3551> nomō Law δὲ <WG1161> de - τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὑμετέρῳ <WG5212> hymeterō your γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai it is written ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that δύο <WG1417> dyo of two ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn men ἡ <WG3588> hē the μαρτυρία <WG3141> martyria testimony ἀληθής <WG227> alēthēs valid . ( See .) ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is

ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am ὁ <WG3588> ho [One] μαρτυρῶν <WG3140> martyrōn who testifies περὶ <WG4012> peri about ἐμαυτοῦ <WG1683> emautou Myself , καὶ <WG2532> kai and μαρτυρεῖ <WG3140> martyrei [also] testifies περὶ <WG4012> peri about ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou Me . ” ὁ <WG3588> ho the πέμψας <WG3992> pempsas [who] sent με <WG1473> me Me , Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ,

Ἔλεγον <WG2036> Elegon they asked οὖν <WG3767> oun - αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him . Ποῦ <WG4226> Pou “ Where ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ? ” σου <WG4771> sou Your Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē answered . Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Οὔτε <WG3777> Oute . . . ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me οἴδατε <WG1492> oidate “ You do not know οὔτε <WG3777> oute [or] τὸν <WG3588> ton - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father , ” μου <WG1473> mou My εἰ <WG1487> ei “ If ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me , ᾔδειτε <WG1492> ēdeite you knew καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ” τὸν <WG3588> ton - Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father μου <WG1473> mou My ἂν <WG302> an vvv ᾔδειτε <WG1492> ēdeite you would know

Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta these τὰ <WG3588> ta - ῥήματα <WG4487> rhēmata words ἐλάλησεν <WG2980> elalēsen He spoke ἐν <WG1722> en near τῷ <WG3588> tō the γαζοφυλακίῳ <WG1049> gazophylakiō treasury . διδάσκων <WG1321> didaskōn while teaching ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō temple [courts] , καὶ <WG2532> kai Yet οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἐπίασεν <WG4084> epiasen seized αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οὔπω <WG3768> oupō had not yet ἐληλύθει <WG2064> elēlythei come . ἡ <WG3588> hē - ὥρα <WG5610> hōra hour αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

Εἶπεν <WG2036> Eipen He said οὖν <WG3767> oun - πάλιν <WG3825> palin Again αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō am going away , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ζητήσετέ <WG2212> zētēsete you will look for με <WG1473> me Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai [but] ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἁμαρτίᾳ <WG266> hamartia sin . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἀποθανεῖσθε <WG599> apothaneisthe you will die ὅπου <WG3699> hopou Where ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō am going , ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe cannot ἐλθεῖν <WG2064> elthein come . ”

Ἔλεγον <WG2036> Elegon began to ask , οὖν <WG3767> oun So οἱ <WG3588> hoi the Ἰουδαῖοι <WG2453> Ioudaioi Jews Μήτι <WG3385> Mēti vvv ἀποκτενεῖ <WG615> apoktenei “ Will He kill ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton Himself , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti since λέγει <WG3004> legei He says , Ὅπου <WG3699> Hopou ‘ Where ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō am going , ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe cannot ἐλθεῖν <WG2064> elthein come ’ ? ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen He told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis “ You ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῶν <WG3588> tōn - κάτω <WG2736> katō below ; ἐστέ <WG1510> este are ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἄνω <WG507> anō above . εἰμί <WG1510> eimi am ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis You ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τούτου <WG3778> toutou this τοῦ <WG3588> tou - κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world ; ἐστέ <WG1510> este are ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou - κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world . τούτου <WG3778> toutou this

εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I told οὖν <WG3767> oun That is why ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἀποθανεῖσθε <WG599> apothaneisthe you would die ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais - ἁμαρτίαις <WG266> hamartiais sins . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἐὰν <WG1437> ean unless γὰρ <WG1063> gar For μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . πιστεύσητε <WG4100> pisteusēte you believe ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am [He] , ἀποθανεῖσθε <WG599> apothaneisthe you will die ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais - ἁμαρτίαις <WG266> hamartiais sins . ” ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your

Ἔλεγον <WG2036> Elegon they asked οὖν <WG3767> oun - αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Σὺ <WG4771> Sy You ? ” τίς <WG5101> tis “ Who εἶ <WG1510> ei are Εἶπεν <WG2036> Eipen replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Τὴν <WG3588> Tēn from the ἀρχὴν <WG746> archēn beginning , ” ὅ¦τι <WG3754> ho¦ti what καὶ <WG2532> kai “ Just λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō I have been telling ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you

πολλὰ <WG4183> polla much ἔχω <WG2192> echō “ I have περὶ <WG4012> peri about ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you λαλεῖν <WG2980> lalein to say καὶ <WG2532> kai and [much] κρίνειν <WG2919> krinein to judge . ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ But ὁ <WG3588> ho the [One who] πέμψας <WG3992> pempsas sent με <WG1473> me Me ἀληθής <WG227> alēthēs truthful , ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō and ἃ <WG3739> ha what ἤκουσα <WG191> ēkousa I have heard παρ’ <WG3844> par’ from αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him , ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta - λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō I tell εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world . ”

Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk vvv ἔγνωσαν <WG1097> egnōsan They did not understand ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that τὸν <WG3588> ton [about] the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father . αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen He was telling

εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said οὖν <WG3767> oun So [αὐτοῖς] <WG846> autois - , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Ὅταν <WG3752> Hotan “ When ὑψώσητε <WG5312> hypsōsēte you have lifted up τὸν <WG3588> ton the Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou of Man , τότε <WG5119> tote then γνώσεσθε <WG1097> gnōsesthe you will know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am [He] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and [that] ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ on ἐμαυτοῦ <WG1683> emautou My own , ποιῶ <WG4160> poiō I do οὐδέν <WG3762> ouden nothing ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs exactly ἐδίδαξέν <WG1321> edidaxen has taught με <WG1473> me Me . ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta what λαλῶ <WG2980> lalō speak
